scripts.build:mobile:static: cross-env NEXT_OUTPUT=export npm run build && npm run copy:static-to-public
scripts.copy:static-to-public: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,file);const destPath=path.join(dest,file);if(fs.statSync(srcPath).isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}});}if(fs.existsSync('out')){copyDir('out','public');console.log('Copied static export to public/');}else{console.log('No out/ directory found. Build may have failed.');}"
scripts.mobile:build-apk: npm run build:mobile && npm run mobile:sync && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
